duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct due diligence and monitor the performance of a portfolio of cash-flow loans.
Utilize DCF and LBO models for analysis and assessment.
Analyze financial information to assess risk and make lending decisions.
Evaluate creditworthiness of borrowers and make lending recommendations.
Collaborate with team members to assess and manage portfolio risks.
Stay updated on industry trends and regulations impacting private credit.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or Economics (CPA is a plus)
